Reviews.Title: False Advertisiment
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: I ordered and hoped for an iPhone 4S 64GB white Verizon phone.  The phone I received was NOT a Verizon phone.  I am very disappointed.  I called Verizon to attempt to activate it and could not ... no SIM card.  I was advised to take it to a corporate store for assistance.  I did.  They sales person and manager tried to assist me.  They determined the phone would not work because it was not a Verizon phone.  Then, just in case they were not being truthful to me, I called Apple and gave them the numbers on the phone and they told me it was NOT a Verizon phone.Although I didn't get what I wanted, I did get my money back.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Salvador Medrano
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I wanted!  This phone is exactly what was advertised.  No frills ordering from amazon warehouse.  I activated through Verizon tech support via alternate phone line.  I was able to keep my 4gb data plan and activate this new phone without disruption of current contract.  Warning: Don't waste your time getting this activated in person at the Verizon store... That was a mistake.  They told me that in order to switch phones, I would lose my 4gb for $30 promo that I've had for a while on my phone line.  After the frustrating in-person conversation at the Verizon store employees, I returned home and called directly to customer service and they switched the phone without question and didn't hassle or worry me with false information.  Please call tech support and save yourself a headache.As for the product, it works flawless!  Thanks amazon!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: Anne Elise
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because my blackberry was a piece of junk and Verizon refused to give me any kind of discount on a replacement.  The only evidence that this was a refurb unit was a bitOf dust in the connector space...otherwise it looks and feels just like. Brand new phone and I LOVE it!  I had forgotten how much easier life is with a phone that does more than phone calls and emails!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone, condition not as expected
Reviews.Author: Liz Langston
Reviews.Content: It would have been nice if the condition of the phone had been described better before purchase.  There are significant scratches along the edges of this iPhone. I have covered them with a case, but this should have been disclosed in a clearer manner.

Reviews.Title: Great phone and customer service
Reviews.Author: F. Ingram
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone with a little hesitancy since it's a "re-furbished" iphone and I wasn't sure if it would be a rip off. To my surprise this phone has performed very well. I'm happy with this product and would order from this company again. I had a question about a function and contacted the seller. The owners replied immediately and helped resolve the issue. I was impressed with their promptness and attentiveness.

Reviews.Title: iLove my iPhone!
Reviews.Author: ScubaKathie Lawler
Reviews.Content: I have had an iPhone 3, 3gs and 4 with a different carrier. I went through 10 warranty replacement HTC phones until I received a marginally functioning HTC Rhyme. It stopped functioning after I dropped it in a pool. Ooops! Being 10 months in to a 2-year contract, I needed to purchase the phone outright. I have been carryong around 2 phones - one for calls, and the iPhone with no service for the apps.Siri is hysterical and tad bit stalker-creepy. When I asked her if she understood sarcasm, she promptly gave me directions to Albuquerque.iTunes has many quality apps. While their selection is considerably more limited than Android's appstore, what good really is a ton of crappy apps? iTunes has had all of the video games, apps and music that I have searched for. If I start feeling nostalgic for a crap app, I still have my Kindle Fire..The only negatives for this phone, in my eyes, is the poor battery life. It does charge fairly quick, so I just make sure I carry around a charger with me at all times.

Reviews.Title: Don't trust phones online
Reviews.Author: Shannon McClure
Reviews.Content: The phone was in perfect shape no scratches or damage is was delivered on time my only problem is the battery life . It say 100% after sitting on the charger all night and then goes to 40% about an hour later when I haven't even used it yet. If I didn't need the phone so bad I would have returned it for a full refund

Reviews.Title: Amazeballs!
Reviews.Author: KT
Reviews.Content: Works great, fast shipping, great price what more could you ask for. I've had no problems with the phone it is exactly how it was described

Reviews.Title: Poor condition
Reviews.Author: Victoria Reichert
Reviews.Content: The item is in poor condition. The screen was scratched and the home button doesn't work half the time. I'm not happy

Reviews.Title: Battery on USED phones- - JUST DON'T DO IT
Reviews.Author: CassimaPwns
Reviews.Content: I've only had the phone for a handful of months and the battery doesn't last but maybe 4 hours before I have to plug in. Highly disappointed. It doesn't even charge to a full 100%. Would be nice if this wasn't listed as "like new" because clearly, it's not.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone but one problem...
Reviews.Author: Regina Barr "ginabugs"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this phone. It works great and is easy to use however the one problem both my husband and myself have had with this phone is the power button.  After months of use, the power button on both of our phones has quit working all of the time.  It did finally quit working altogether on my husband's phone and he had to have it replaced by Apple.  I have had my phone for about 8 months and the power button has started giving me problems on mine.  I am not sure if this is a common problem known to iphones but it has happend to both of ours now.  I do prefer the interface on the apple when compared to droid though.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, thank you.
Reviews.Author: Dianna W Black
Reviews.Content: It was refurbished by Asurion, though, rather than "NEW" as listed. You may have mentioned such in the details of your listing.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Zahn
Reviews.Content: PLEASE save yourself the time and money and do not buy form these people. I recieved my Phone in a timely fashion, and it worked for about a month or so. It started rejecting chargers and then not charging at all. I took it to apple and they said it will be a $200 fix. I decided to take it to one of the fix it shops, and was SHOCKED at what i found out. I paid for a 4s but the packing was of a 4. The phone had been previously opened and fixed. There was previous water damage and most of the inside parts had been switched out. I was sold a phone that had been broken before???? AND then i was told there is no refund after 30 days??? I spent over $400 for a piece of crap that wont even stay on anymore. NEVER will i EVER buy a phone off of amazon anymore nor from this seller in specifics. I wish i would have known this before i got the phone or atleast in the first 30days. And they still refuse to refund my money.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware advertised as one thing, you'll get something else
Reviews.Author: Mila
Reviews.Content: It was not as advertised. Warehouse deals refunded me. The phone was NOT a verizon cellphone, it had some kind of grease along the metal frame of the phone, several scratches along the metal frame, and a chunk was missing from the back side near the camera lens. The  advertised 'used-like new'?

Reviews.Title: buy it
Reviews.Author: jonathan Kirby
Reviews.Content: works great way better than any android ive ever owned would recommend it if your looking for a fast phone that doesnt freeze or crash

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4S
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: I had to send this phone back because when I called Apple to purchase AppleCare+ they said it was not a new phone. It had never been activated or even opened, but it was a factory replacement, so they would not allow the extended coverage, then the screen got broke. The seller did work with me, because of this issue of it not being a new phone not eligible for extended warranty, and refunded my full purchase price. Greatly appreciate the sellers cooperation with everything.

Reviews.Title: Come on, it's Apple
Reviews.Author: Joshua Lathrop
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas. Great product. It's true what they say... You get what you pay for. Apple may typically be more spendy up front, but it's like buying a Honda. Great product, holds strong resale value.

Reviews.Title: First IPhone
Reviews.Author: ben b
Reviews.Content: This is my first IPhone, I have had a android and a black berry. Android and iPhone's have lots of similarities I like them both for different reasons so either is a good choice if your are trying to decide what you want.
